lead_paragraph: In these days of worms, Trojan horse attachments and other security threats delivered through the Internet, the personal computer can seem like a medieval castle under siege. Fireball CyberProtection Suite from Red Cannon Security offers several weapons for the defense arsenal so you will not have to dig a moat around your desk. The suite includes a firewall program with security controls for both novices and advanced users as well as a set of privacy-protection features that can monitor incoming and outgoing e-mail, smash snoopy browser cookies, block Javascript code and pop-up ads, and filter content from Web sites. Parental control functions within the software can be used to monitor and restrict a child's use of the Internet. Telecommuters and others connecting to corporate systems from home or a hotel can use the virtual private network program that comes in the software suite to keep their connections confidential.

headline.main: So, That's the Way The Cookies Crumble
